Bibliographic References: PP, no. 38, pi. 9a; PPSupp, no. 47; PhV2, p. 37, no. 43 (with bibliography to date).
Imagery Description: (a) Phlyax, with wreath in r. hand and phiale in 1., standing in front of Dionysos, who bends slightly forward, with a round object (cake ?) in his r. hand and a thyrsus in his 1., (b) Bl + A2r, with stick.
